data.title: Love this place!  Delicious salads and wraps
data.text: Had a delicious salad.  Their salad and wraps are made to order with fresh ingredients and a great selection of add ins.

data.title: Nice Alternative
data.text: Having lived in Northern Virginia and living the vast range of salad restaurants there it was a nice surprise to see one open in this area. Their salad options are plentiful and their soups and panini sandwiches are also good. The food is fresh and the staff are friendly. Although a bit pricey for a salad this is a good alternative for those trying to eat healthy.

data.title: Great Salad, Crappy Service
data.text: My wife and I stopped here for a quick meal and the salad was great.  The service, on the other hand was not so great.  Instead of a friendly smile, we got a why are you here and please take your food look.  They were polite enough but the tone was enough to strip rust off chrome.  I would eat there again, if I were in the area, but I wouldn't expect a good greeting.

data.title: Great healthy alternativd
data.text: A nice little hole in the wall alternative to being overloaded with pastries & fast food. Definitely a good go to for lunch on the go for those a by more health conscious. Snag the salad & cruise the fountain, or just enjoy the view.

data.title: Immaculate!
data.text: This restaurant is located right on the lovely pond in City Center.  Great choices of salads and wraps, plus 4 choices of soup.  Young ladies that work there were pleasant, helpful and efficient.  Place was immaculate.

data.title: Lunch?
data.text: Sitting in a shopping plaza, you can get a collection of salads, not dinner.  It appears to be a haunt for local workers to get lunch.

data.title: Good Salad
data.text: I was surprised. At first I said, Wow that's a small salad for the price (comparing them to Panera Bread) but I was pleasantly surprised. The salad was more than I thought and it tasted good (fresh). My husband on the other hand was looking for something to accompany his salad as he felt it was too small and not very filling. I would eat there again, and he might -- as a side salad kind of thing.

data.title: Ok
data.text: I went for lunch. Place is nice. Lots of choices to choose. I got Jr. Salad and it really meant jr, I don't eat much but that was really small. Good taste but a little expensive for what I got.

data.title: Outstanding Salad
data.text: We were trying to decide where to eat when we looked out of our hotel room to see Salad Creations.  We thought a salad would be okay since we had eaten a late lunch.  This turned out  to be an outstanding staff and a real gentleman waiting on us.  We took the salad back to our hotel room and really enjoyed it.  Excellent Salad. Patient empoyee.

data.title: Excellent salads
data.text: Love this place - great salads at great prices - fast and efficient with good service - nice range of options as well

data.title: Great food but overpriced
data.text: Popped in here for a quick salad to go.  The actually food was delicious, but you get a tiny salad for a big price.  The kids "quesadilla" was very gross, my child would not even touch it.  The staff was also not overly friendly.  It's an okay place to grab a bite, but there are other better options nearby.

data.title: Ate every meal here
data.text: They have a ton of options. I ate both lunch and dinner here for three days and loved it! The staff is friendly and helpful and everything was extremely fresh. Good thing there isn't one at home...I'd move in!

data.title: Holly Dazzle
data.text: The great thing about this place is you get to pick from the menu or create your own salad. You will definitely be satisfied after eating at Salad Creations.

data.title: informal quick salad bar
data.text: The ingredients were fresh and the salads are reasonably priced. The variety and choices for salad add-ins were limited compared to other places I've been but you can still get a good salad there. The eating area was about as clean as you expect for a quick eating establishment like this. It is nice and brightly decorated.

data.title: Good quality, but overpriced
data.text: Being a vegetarian/vegan, I was very excited to try this restaurant. The quality is pretty good, but I found it to be overpriced for what you get. When they measure in "scoops", they really mean thimblefuls.  However, I'm glad to see that kind of restaurant come to this area, and I would probably eat there again sometime.

data.title: Excellent healthy alternative
data.text:
My wife and I are trying to eat healthier, so while looking for a lunch spot with a decent salad bar (our default has been Ruby Tuesday's) we came across Salad Creations. We checked reviews on TA (as always), and decided to give it a try. Glad we did.
The place was clean, if a bit contemporary for our taste, and the server was friendly and helpful. Essentially set up like a Subway, the selection of ingredients is very good. They offer a variety of pre-planned options, or you can build your own. They also have wraps, panninis, soups, and even a (very limited) kids menu.
My wife had the Thai Crunch, and I had the Baja Shrimp Cobb. Both were delicious. We also had the Thai Chicken soup, and the Minestrone. Again, both were delicious. The best part was, we found an excellent alternative to the typical fast-food offerings. 
We'll definitely be back.

data.title: Good Salad
data.text: I enjoyed a great Derby Chicken Cobb salad.  What made it stand out was the sprinkling of Fried Onions on top - they added just the right amount of crunch and saltiness.  This restaurant has 3 categories of salads - Classic, Signature and Premium.  Mine was a premium.  All ingredients are fresh and salads are made to order.  There is an option to make up your own salad.

data.title: Neat place.
data.text: Its a neat place to go. I like that they have a lot of options but their quality in my opinion, is not better than any other place I've been. If you like meats in your salad, this place won't disappoint but I am limited so I didnt have as much to choose from!

data.title: Good Salads for lunch and dinner
data.text: Eat here every time I am in Newport News on business.  Food is always fresh, well prepared and tasty.

data.title: Great salads!
data.text: I loved this place.  It is clean, contemporary and I ate a great salad.  The large size is really huge.  I also got the pasta fagioli soup, which I really enjoyed.  I got the make your own salad.
